description.value:
Massive garages function as garages, can be mounted on Huge or larger ships, and take up two expansion bays. They can house 1 Colossal, 2 Gargantuan, 4 Huge, or 16 Large terrestrial vehicles.

@UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.starship-components.Item.uMWSxOJnVQ0OmtQm]{Garage}

A garage must be mounted on a ship thatâ€™s Small or larger. It can store 1 Large or smaller terrestrial vehicle. While a vehicle is housed in a garage, repairs on it take half the time. A vehicle can be deployed from the garage directly to the surface if the ship has landed, or it can be loaded into an available @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.vehicles.Actor.x0klv9uWW4crarM5]{drop pod} (Starfinder Starship Operations Manual 25) or @UUID[Compendium.sfrpg.starship-components.Item.ZCdtfwxHAsEthpzy]{sky crane} (page 29).
